page.title: 20HOUSEWIFE/CONTINUED
page.content: Clear table, wash dishes. Put clothes in washing machine. Hang clothes outside. 10.00 a.m. - Make coffee. 10.30 a.m. - Make beds, change sheets and wash sheets. 11.00 a.m. - Hoover and dust. 12.00 p.m. - Make lunch - barbequed sausages,salad and pot. Set table. Clear table and wash dishes. 3.00 p.m. - Go to Glenae, have a walk round and have tea in the house. 5.00 p.m. - Go to garage. 7.00 p.m. - Go to Allan's mother's for tea. 8.30 p.m. - come home. Do a pile of ironing 10.00 p.m. - Have supper. 11.30 p.m. - Go to bed.
